content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'fsgdmsdevweeu01_stgdmsdevweeu01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [fsgdmsdevweeu01_stgdmsdevweeu01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://fsgdmsdevweeu01@stgdmsdevweeu01.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Emission] (
	[Country] nvarchar(4000),
	[CarbonScope] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmissionCategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmissionType] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmissionFactorLocationBased] float,
	[EmissionFactorMarketBased] float,
	[UnitOfMeasure] nvarchar(4000),
	[StartDate] date,
	[EndDate] date,
	[Region] nvarchar(4000),
	[HasMarketBasedFactor] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'ESG_staging/EmissionFactors.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [fsgdmsdevweeu01_stgdmsdevweeu01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[Emission]
GO
